title: DTL service delayed due to train fault

title_translations.ms: Perkhidmatan DTL tertunda kerana kerosakan kereta api
title_translations.ta: ரயில் பழுது காரணமாக DTL சேவை தாமதமானது

updates.text:
DTL service from DT03 HillView to DT09 Botanic 
(towards DT35 Expo station) is 
delayed due to a train fault. 
Additional travel time of about 10
minutes may be expected. We are 
sorry for the inconvenience caused.
